alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Walker and Dade Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Stephensville, or near Trenton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Trenton, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Rising Fawn, Cole City, Wildwood, Fairview, Stephensville, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park and Cooper Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
